questions.question: Is the system suitable for a small restaurant or food truck?
questions.answer: Yes absolutely! The system is designed to suit all restaurant sizes and applications, from small projects to large chains. You can start with the basic plan and then upgrade as your business grows.

questions.question: Can the system integrate with existing POS systems?
questions.answer: Yes, the system supports integration with most popular POS systems and banking services. It can also be linked to delivery apps like HungerStation, Talabat and Uber Eats.

questions.question: How secure is customer data and payment information?
questions.answer: We use bank-level security with SSL encryption and comply with international security standards. All payment data is processed through certified payment gateways and we never store sensitive payment information on our servers.

questions.question: What kind of support do you provide?
questions.answer: We offer 24/7 technical support through multiple channels including phone, email, and live chat. Our team also provides free training sessions and setup assistance for new customers.

questions.question: Can I customize the menu and pricing?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You have full control over your menu items, categories, pricing, and availability. You can update everything in real-time through our easy-to-use dashboard or mobile app.

questions.question: Is there a free trial available?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start, and you can cancel anytime during the trial period.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use So-Eat.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as:

• Account information (name, email, phone number)
• Restaurant preferences and dietary restrictions
• Reservation and order history
• Payment information (processed securely)
• Location data (with your permission)
• Device and usage information

We also collect information automatically through cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience and analyze usage patterns.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content:
We use your information to:

• Provide and improve our services
• Process reservations and orders
• Send important updates and notifications
• Personalize your experience and recommendations
• Analyze usage patterns and improve our platform
• Prevent fraud and ensure security
• Comply with legal obligations

We do not sell your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

protection.title: 3. Data Protection & Security
protection.content:
We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:

• Encryption of sensitive data in transit and at rest
• Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
• Access controls and authentication systems
• Secure payment processing through certified providers
• Regular staff training on data protection
• Incident response procedures

While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content:
We use cookies and similar technologies to:

• Remember your preferences and settings
• Analyze website traffic and usage patterns
• Provide personalized content and recommendations
• Enable social media features
• Improve website performance and functionality

You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. However, disabling cookies may affect some website functionality.

rights.title: 5. Your Privacy Rights
rights.content:
You have the right to:

• Access your personal information
• Correct inaccurate data
• Request deletion of your data
• Object to processing of your data
• Data portability
• Withdraw consent at any time

To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

thirdParty.title: 6. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content:
We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in:

• Payment processing (Stripe, PayPal)
• Analytics and performance monitoring
• Customer support services
• Marketing and communication tools
• Cloud storage and hosting services

These partners are contractually bound to protect your information and use it only for specified purposes.
